title: proPower: Prospective power analyses for frequentist regression models
text:
Example 1: vowel duration

library(tidyverse)

eng_s <- readRDS("data/eng_s.rds")
eng_s |> select(speaker, num_syl, voicing, v1_duration, speech_rate_c)

# A tibble: 720 × 5
   speaker num_syl voicing   v1_duration speech_rate_c
   <fct>   <fct>   <fct>           <dbl>         <dbl>
 1 en02    di      voiced          117.         -0.650
 2 en02    mono    voiceless        95.0        -0.908
 3 en02    mono    voiceless       106.         -0.900
 4 en02    di      voiced          190.         -0.750
 5 en02    di      voiced          195.         -0.383
 6 en02    di      voiceless       113.         -0.655
 7 en02    mono    voiced          203.         -0.823
 8 en02    mono    voiceless       217.         -0.534
 9 en02    di      voiced          120.         -0.571
10 en02    di      voiceless       147.         -0.665
# ℹ 710 more rows
